BonusDescriptions: WordsWords: Does not support Pirate weapons or weapons with already builtin in augmentations.
WordsWords: Field Inhibitors must be enabled for PPC weapons when using a TEMPEST manifold. Any firing modes that disable Field Inhibitors will therefore not be available.

Description.Name: TEMPEST Attachment
Description.Details: A breakthrough in plasma-based weapon augmentation, Thermo-Electro-Magnetic Plasma Energy Synchronization Transducers (TEMPEST) are advanced manifolds developed by the Minnesota Tribe to regulate and exploit the thermal and electromagnetic output of specialized fusion cores—particularly the Magnothermic Plasma Engine. Integrated into PPCs, flamers, plasma rifles, and TSEMP systems, TEMPEST units channel superheated plasma into the weapon discharge matrix, dramatically increasing both kinetic and thermal impact. While the plasma stream briefly aids in weapon-cycle cooling, each activation adds a stacking thermal load that gradually overwhelms even the most powerful heat sinks. Prolonged use rapidly escalates internal heat levels, risking system overload and shutdown. Despite these dangers, the raw firepower TEMPEST provides has made it a hallmark of the Tribe’s heaviest frontline units.
